authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

organizationSlug.name: organizationSlug
organizationSlug.description: The slug of the organization the team belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
organizationSlug.ai_hint: The slug of the organization the team belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

projectSlug.name: projectSlug
projectSlug.description: The slug of the project to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectSlug.ai_hint: The slug of the project to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

full.name: full
full.description: Whether the event payload will include the full event body, including the stack trace

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: The ID of the event to retrieve (either the numeric primary-key or the hexadecimal ID as reported by the raven client)
eventId.ai_hint: The ID of the event to retrieve (either the numeric primary-key or the hexadecimal ID as reported by the raven client)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: slug
options.description: The optional slug for this team. If not provided it will be auto generated from the name.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

agreeTerms.name: agreeTerms
agreeTerms.description: Whether you agree to the applicable terms of service and privacy policy of Sentry.io

organization_slug.name: organization_slug
organization_slug.description: The slug of the organization to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
organization_slug.ai_hint: The slug of the organization to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: name
options.description: The new name of the team

options.name: slug
options.description: The new slug of the team. Must be unique and available.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

teamSlug.name: teamSlug
teamSlug.description: The slug of the team to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
teamSlug.ai_hint: The slug of the team to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

version.name: version
version.description: A version identifier for this release. Can be a version number, a commit hash etc.
version.ai_hint: A version identifier for this release. Can be a version number, a commit hash etc.

url.name: url
url.description: A URL that points to the release. This can be the path to an online interface to the sourcecode for instance.
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

projects.name: projects
projects.description: A list of project slugs that are involved in this release. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
projects.ai_hint: A list of project slugs that are involved in this release. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'full'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'event' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'issue' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'issue' AND operation IN ["get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'issueId'
IF resource == 'issue' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'issue' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'issue' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'issue' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'issue' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'issue' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'issueId'
IF resource == 'issue' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'organization' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'agreeTerms'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organization_slug'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation IN ["create", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamSlug'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF resource == 'release' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'release' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'release' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation IN ["get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation IN ["get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'projects'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF resource == 'release' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'team' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'team' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'team' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamSlug'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamSlug'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationSlug'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamSlug'
